kDesc
Nothing like a hot cup of Joe to kickstart your morning. [#Legal]
Rien de tel qu'une bonne tasse de caoua pour démarrer la journée. [#Legal]
Nichts bringt Sie am Morgen besser in Gang als eine heiße Tasse "Joe". [#Legal]
Non c'è niente di meglio che una tazza di caffè bollente per iniziare la giornata. [#Legal]
Nada como una taza de café caliente para empezar fuerte la mañana. [#Legal]

Nothing like a hot cup of Joe to kickstart your morning.\n ※ Active items provide more functionality than normal items. You may only place limited numbers of the active items in your apartment or clubhouse at any time. [#Legal]
